name: Electronaut
description:
Multidimensional battery maintenance.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 39 based on the theme "Running out of power".
Inspired by Rick & Morty Season 2 Episode 6 "The Ricks Must Be Crazy".

Dive into a multidimensional battery and protect it from several insides! The longer you survive, the more dimensions you have to work in.

Code: Connor Halford (timelapse)
Art: Tobias Cook
Audio: Andrew Dodds
